title: This Is the True Scale of New York’s Airbnb Apocalypse
description: A law meant to crack down on short-term rentals in New York City took effect Tuesday. Thousands have dropped off the map, but there are still hosts offering bookings that may break the law.

title: Pinterest’s New Algorithms Want You to See Every Body Type
description: Social media algorithms usually promote biases toward white, thin bodies. Pinterest is using machine learning to surface images of all shapes and sizes.

title: Love, Loss, and Pig Butchering Scams
description: Bruce had kind eyes and dressed well. Evelyn fell for him on Hinge, and then he stole $300,000. Now, she’s following the money trail.

title: The Generative AI Boom Could Fuel a New International Arms Race
description: Two new studies of the potential of text- and image-generating algorithms suggest they could add scary new scale and power to online disinformation campaigns.
